beer.name: Rye Pilsner
beer.description: A nice, spicy twist on the traditional European Pilsener. Rye malt adds dimension to what otherwise is a relatively simple brew. We've used generous amouns of this complex malt so you can pick out the unique flavors. You'll notice a nice subtle spiciness in the finish complemented by a crisp bitterness from Vanguard hops.
